GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: Responds with an article for the given id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/article_id/comments.description: Returns all the comments from article with the given id number

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: This is a bad article name

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a body to an existing ID

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates votes in an existing article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the given comment when passed an id
